channel.title: Half Life 3 Timeline
channel.description:
[b]Hey everyone![/b]
I made a timeline on my website about information for [b]Half Life 3.[/b] Please check it out and reply with your thoughts about it (changes,mistakes,...) [url='https://halflife3news.com/timeline']Click here for the Timeline[/url]
Thanks, Applepie

item.title: Half Life 3 Timeline

item.description:
Thanks for your reply, I appreciate it!
And there will be more content later.
Like Half Life 3 Fan art, Related games,…
If anyone has more idea’s or want to help me with the website, then feel free to PM me!
